mean_cn: n. 地址，称呼，致词；  v. 发表演说，处理，写地址，称呼
mean_en: the words and numbers that are used to describe the location of a building and that are written on letters, envelopes, and packages so that they can be mailed to that location
deformation_desc: 大写的A抽象成了房屋的形状，代表你家的地址。
sentence: You can see the address on the outside of the house.
sentence_trans: 你可以在房子的外面看见地址。
